<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>07a26fd3-05a8-4517-b877-dd58627c55bd#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az acél felhasználása</string>
            <string language="en">usage of steel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbrauch des Stahls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">utilisation d'acier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uso do aço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">uso di acciaio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρήση του χάλυβα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">uso del acero</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A gépkocsik karosszériája nagyrészt acélból készül</string>
            <string language="en">cars mainly made of steel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">vas,  gépkocsi,  </string>
            <string language="en">steel, car,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Autos hauptsächlich gebildet vom Stahl</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voitures principalement faites d'acier</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carros feitos principalmente do aço</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">automobili pricipalmente fatti di acciaio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αυτοκίνητα φιαγμένα κυρίως από χάλυβα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">coches hechos principalmente del acero</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stahl, Auto,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">acier, voiture,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aço, carro,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acciaio, automobile,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χάλυβας, αυτοκίνητο,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">acero, coche,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>

            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>195</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>

    </metadata>
